name: Kenny Kickballhead
description:
Kenny Kickballhead. Kick Kenny's head to the red and yellow wormhole!

A and D to position feet. 

Space to kick.

R to reset postition.

C to focus on wormhole.

Game design, code, game art, animation: Mike Bailey

Tools used: Unity, GIMP, Audacity

font: https://www.urbanfonts.com/fonts/Bubble_Butt_Expanded.font

Sounds and music from freesound.org (licence https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/):
